WorkItem.Description:
I am trying to force Code Review at Check-in Process.
I have managed to implement it in TFS 2010, using StyleCop and the tool "StyleCop Team Foundation Server check-in policy".
Ref: http://archive.msdn.microsoft.com/StyleCopPolicy/Release/ProjectReleases.aspx?ReleaseId=4204
 
Now I am trying to implement the same in SVN & CVS.
I prefer to stick on with StyleCop for consistency.
 
Kindly suggest an approach to implement StyleCop Code Review at every Check-in from SVN, such that, the check-in only succeeds only if the Code is as per standards defined by the StyleCop rules file (.stylecop).
